description:
Calendar dates were shifted by a random amount of days as part of the data de-identification process. All calendar dates for a given subject have been offset by the same amount of days. Item from the Experiences of Discrimination (EOD), created to measure exposure to racial discrimination. [Krieger N and Smith K, 2005 (PubMed ID: 16005789)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/16005789/)

[Search for all EOD variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/pats/variables?search=eod)
